metadata.name: File Download with Headless Browser
metadata.comment: Detects execution of chromium based browser in headless mode using the "dump-dom" command line to download files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\brave.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\opera.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\vivaldi.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--headless')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dump-dom')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')))

output.summary: Detects execution of chromium based browser in headless mode using the "dump-dom" command line to download files
